description: Removes one or more tags from the specified resource. This operation is supported in storage gateways of all types.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource you want to remove the tags from.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The keys of the tags you want to remove from the specified resource. A tag is composed of a key-value pair. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that the tags were removed from.
